devdoc.details: One of the vesting pools (maybe, the major one) which the VestingPools contract vests $ZKP tokens to is the "Reward Pool" (aka "Protocol Pool"). This contract assumed to have a "pool wallet" role with the VestingPools, and therefore has a privilege to request vesting $ZKPs from the Reward Pool to the "recipient". The "RewardMaster" contract, that distributes tokens to users as rewards, is assumed to be the "recipient". This contract is expected to be replaced. Therefore it allows the owner to transfer the "pool wallet" role to another account.

initialize(uint8,address,uint32).details: Owner only may call, once only This contract address must be set in the VestingPools as the wallet for the pool

transferPoolWalletRole(address).details: Owner only may call, once only

devdoc.title: RewardPool

OWNER().notice: The owner who has privileged rights

initialize(uint8,address,uint32).notice: Sets the {poolId} and the {recipient} to given values

poolId().notice: ID of the pool (in the VestingPools) to vest from

releasableAmount().notice: Returns token amount that may be released (vested) now

transferPoolWalletRole(address).notice: Calls VestingPools to transfer 'pool wallet' role to given address

vestRewards().notice: Vests releasable token amount to the {recipient}

userdoc.notice: It vests $ZKP token from the Panther Protocol "Reward Pool".
